title: 81,000,000 players
body:
81,000,000 players playing League every month in 2017.

How many people on the boards complaining about every little change that Riot makes? 

How many people on the boards saying Riot doesn't know how to do their jobs and should be fired?

How many people on the boards can make 81,000,000 players happy?  How about half?  How about 10%?  

If you guys know so much more than Riot then get off your ass and go save us all.  Submit an application and resume to Riot and blow them away with your balance ideas.  Wow them so hard that you become the new face of the balance team.

replies.body: Where are you getting that 81 million from?
google lol

> [{quoted}](name=MegaSpaceJX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-26T18:07:37.686+0000)
>
> google lol

Where, links?

> [{quoted}](name=Bird Bean,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-26T18:11:33.597+0000)
>
> https://www.unrankedsmurfs.com/blog/players-2017

I don't think a 3rd party site that sells accounts is substantial proof.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-26T18:14:11.482+0000)
>
> I don't think a 3rd party site that sells accounts is substantial proof.

I like how OP links a site with "smurfs" in the name and claims that 81m accounts = 81m players.

Also, the current year is 2018, not 2017, and in 2018 YoY revenues are down 21% and it's LoL's worst year since 2014.

quality thred tho
Uh not sure about that. With this year's worlds being the most viewed esport in history, I doubt their revenues are suffering to that extent.

> [{quoted}](name=Pandemic Punch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010002,timestamp=2018-11-26T18:32:57.702+0000)
>
> Uh not sure about that. With this year's worlds being the most viewed esport in history, I doubt their revenues are suffering to that extent.

Wasn't this years worlds like the most viewed esport/sport period?  I thought I read that somewhere

Yes, and you probably just read it in the post you replied to because I literally typed it there with different wording LOL

Jokes aside, here is one of the sources where you could have seen it. https://www.talkesport.com/news/league-of-legends-in-2018-was-the-worlds-most-viewed-esports-game-in-history/

> [{quoted}](name=Pandemic Punch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=000100000000000000000001000200000000,timestamp=2018-11-26T19:18:18.813+0000)

Got me there... ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Pandemic Punch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010002,timestamp=2018-11-26T18:32:57.702+0000)
>
> Uh not sure about that. With this year's worlds being the most viewed esport in history, I doubt their revenues are suffering to that extent.

Uh maybe you should be sure about that. :P

https://www.dbltap.com/posts/6181262-league-of-legends-on-pace-for-lowest-revenue-since-2014

Like, where did people think I got 21% from? That would be an oddly specific number to fabricate.

https://www.talkesport.com/news/league-of-legends-in-2018-was-the-worlds-most-viewed-esports-game-in-history/

https://esc.watch/blog/post/worlds-2018-final

https://hablamosdegamers.com/en/esports/worlds-2018-record-espectadores/

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Pandemic Punch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=000100000000000000000001000200010002,timestamp=2018-11-26T19:20:28.578+0000)
>

> https://esc.watch/blog/post/worlds-2018-final
> 
> https://hablamosdegamers.com/en/esports/worlds-2018-record-espectadores/
> 
> {{sticker:poppy-wink}}

That's great! Maybe it'll be reflected in next year's numbers.

Also note that there's a difference between "players" and "viewers."

{{sticker:galio-happy}}

This is the part of the discussion where you get irrational and argue for argument's sake. I wont partake in that little game.

You seem to have forgotten that the discussion is about revenue. Not players or viewers. Revenue wont be negatively affected by being the most viewed esport in world history up to this point.

Good luck with your "argument". LOL

>
> Question, where do they get THEIR numbers from by the way, I'm not doubting that they are down, but like is there anything to showcase the drop?

Usually from superdata. one of those sites where you have to pay money to see the article. Now they actually aren’t partnered with Riot, but they are partnered with tencent so if they are ok with releasing the information then it seems like Tencent doesn’t really care that Riot is losing money.

> [{quoted}](name=notMineskiexo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010002000100000000,timestamp=2018-11-26T19:01:14.666+0000)

Ugh, I just want to see figures, how annoying.

Why since 2014? Isn't season 4 ''Riots golden years'' according to the boards?

> [{quoted}](name=ankoanko19,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010004,timestamp=2018-11-26T23:37:43.885+0000)
>
> Why since 2014? Isn't season 4 ''Riots golden years'' according to the boards?

I dunno. Maybe LoL was better but smaller in those days, then grew on the success of that season while changing everything that made it good, and now Riot's mistakes have finally caught up with them and revenue is down. Who can say, really.
Revenue source?

> [{quoted}](name=usul1202,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=0001000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-11-26T18:24:37.054+0000)
>
> Revenue source?

https://www.pcgamesn.com/league-of-legends/league-of-legends-sales and others.

Interesting. Notably, their source (super data) has league way up on revenue this month (new stats out the 21st) compared to before, which makes sense due to riot backloading events this year pretty heavily. I have to admit, I'm not very familiar with superdata, they seem to do a lot of backend work, but their methods and specific data are hidden behind a paywall. If their method is sound then that is a reasonably serious drop, although from what I see the more recent stats correct a decent bit of it.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kHckBxfR,comment-id=000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-11-26T18:21:38.196+0000)

This post is ignorant.

I needed that haha

Complains are there to help improve the game and if you think otherwise then you are not that bright i am sorry. The real problem happens when people stop complaining and start leaving the game, you can ask Wild Star about that one.

Complaining doesn't help anything.  

Identifying the issue and offering constructive criticism does.  Understand the problem, offer a solution or 2.
